user.title: Cheapest Energy Windows Setup
user.description:
Welcome to Cheapest Energy Windows!

This integration helps you optimize energy costs by finding the cheapest times to charge and most expensive times to discharge your battery system.

How would you like to proceed?

data_description.setup_type: Choose between guided setup with configuration options or quick setup using defaults

data_description.price_sensor: Select the Nordpool sensor that provides your electricity price data

data_description.price_country: Select the pricing formula that matches your energy contract

data_description.tax: Energy tax per kWh from your invoice
data_description.additional_cost: Supplier markup and transport costs per kWh

data_description.vat: VAT percentage applied to buy price only

data_description.use_min_sell_price: Only discharge when sell price exceeds the minimum
data_description.min_sell_price_bypass_spread: Allow discharge when price exceeds minimum, ignoring spread requirements

data_description.base_usage: Average constant power consumption (lights, appliances, standby devices)
data_description.base_usage_charge_strategy: How base load is handled while battery charges
data_description.base_usage_normal_strategy: How base load is handled when battery is in normal mode
data_description.base_usage_discharge_strategy: How base load affects discharge calculations

data_description.charge_power: Maximum battery charging power in Watts
data_description.discharge_power: Maximum battery discharging power in Watts
data_description.battery_rte: Energy retained after full charge/discharge cycle (typically 85%)

data.charging_windows: Charging Windows (how many cheapest time slots)
data.expensive_windows: Discharge Windows (how many most expensive slots)

data_description.pricing_window_duration: Match this to your energy contract (15-min or hourly pricing)
data_description.charging_windows: How many cheapest time windows to use for charging (1-96)
data_description.expensive_windows: How many most expensive windows to use for discharging (0-96)
data_description.percentile_threshold: Percentile threshold for cheapest X% (charging) and most expensive X% (discharging) prices
data_description.min_spread: Minimum price spread % required to activate charging (0-200%)
data_description.min_spread_discharge: Minimum spread % required for normal discharge (0-200%)
data_description.min_price_difference: Absolute minimum price difference in EUR/kWh to activate charging (0-0.5)
data_description.price_override_enabled: Always charge when price drops below threshold, ignoring spread/window requirements
data_description.price_override_threshold: Price threshold in EUR/kWh - charge immediately when spot price is below this value (0-0.5)

data_description.battery_system_name: Friendly name for your battery system (leave empty to skip)
data_description.battery_soc_sensor: Sensor showing current battery charge % (0-100). Example: sensor.battery_soc
data_description.battery_available_energy_sensor: Sensor showing available battery capacity in kWh. Example: sensor.battery_available_energy
data_description.battery_daily_charge_sensor: Sensor tracking total energy charged today in kWh (must reset daily)
data_description.battery_daily_discharge_sensor: Sensor tracking total energy discharged today in kWh (must reset daily)
data_description.battery_power_sensor: Sensor showing current battery power in W (positive=charging, negative=discharging)

data_description.battery_normal_action: Select automation/script for normal mode. Example: Set battery to follow grid (Smart Matching)
data_description.battery_charge_action: Select automation/script for charge mode. Example: Enable battery charging from grid at max power
data_description.battery_discharge_action: Select automation/script for discharge mode. Example: Enable battery discharge to grid at normal power
data_description.battery_off_action: Select automation/script for off mode. Example: Set battery to manual mode when automation is disabled

error.invalid_price_sensor: The selected price sensor is invalid, missing required 'raw_today' attribute, or not properly configured. Ensure the sensor provides hourly or 15-minute price data.
error.no_price_sensors: No compatible price sensors found. Please install a compatible price sensor (e.g., Nordpool, ENTSO-E). See GitHub for the full list.
error.automation_creation_failed: Failed to create automation. You can create it manually after setup.

abort.already_configured: Cheapest Energy Windows is already configured
abort.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to price sensor
